name: RainMaker
description:
Rain dance VR experience & game

Learn the shocking truth about rain dances of the native americans, and have some fun while doing it :)

Is an interactive experience
helping you understand
the basic principles
of Rain-making ritual
performed by tribal
Shamans.

Is set inside native american setlement during night,
just before rain.

and highly individual
experience is making
use of popular mechanics
taken from rhytmic games
to prove an educational
point in cultural history.
